channel.title: Getting Started on AMMI Scientific Python Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on AMMI Scientific Python Workshop

item.title: Contribution Types
item.description: There are many different ways that one can contribute to open source projects. In this workshop we’re focused mostly on the various ways that you can contribute as a developer. Developer Contributions There are three main ways that you can contribute to an open source software project as a developer: Submitting new code (via pull requests) Opening issues Reviewing others’ code Submitting Pull Requests It’s obvious how submitting new code contributes to the development of a library, though it’s important to note that not every PR has to be new functionality.
